49.ara-name: كتاب المناقب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin Mas'ud:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The best generation is my generation, then those who follow them, then those who follow them. Then comes a people after that whose swearing precedes their testimony, or whose testimony precedes their swearing
